title: HoP 325 - Platonic Love - Gemistos Plethon
itunes:title: HoP 325 - Platonic Love - Gemistos Plethon
description: Was Gemistos Plethon, the last great thinker of the Byzantine tradition, a secret pagan or just a Christian with an unusual enthusiasm for Platonism?
